sentences.en: Aren't Ah Ch'ou and your Ah Hsiung both Fang grandsons?
sentences.cn: 阿丑跟你们阿凶不是一样的方家孙子.

sentences.en: As Tseng Kuo - fang once said,'Believe not in heaven but in luck.'"
sentences.cn: 曾文正公说: ‘ 不信天,信运气. ’ ”

sentences.en: By merely letting drop one lighthearted remark, Miss Pao had Fang hooked.
sentences.cn: 鲍小姐只轻松一句话就把方鸿渐钩住了.

sentences.en: Fang Hung - chien found the dinner at the Hans quite satisfactory.
sentences.cn: 方鸿 渐 吃韩家的晚饭,甚为满意.

sentences.en: Fang Hung - chien said hesitatingly , " No, your cousin is also coming. "
sentences.cn: 方鸿 渐 讷讷道: “ 不, 还有你表妹. ”

sentences.en: Fang Hung - chien was certain that he had spoken very properly.
sentences.cn: 方鸿 渐 自信说话得体.

sentences.en: I'll have to use Mr. Fang's address, " and with that she giggled.
sentences.cn: 要开方先生府上的地址了, ” 说时格格地笑.

sentences.en: It'suddenly occurred to Fang that Miss T'ang did not use any makeup.
sentences.cn: 他忽然想唐小姐并不十妆饰.

sentences.en: Miss Su's condemnation of Fang Hung - chien for being shameless was actually unjust.
sentences.cn: 苏小姐骂方鸿 渐 无耻,实在是冤枉.

sentences.en: Miss Su's parting manner dampened Fang Hung - chien's high spirits.
sentences.cn: 苏小姐临别时的态度,冷缩了方鸿 渐 的高兴.

sentences.en: Miss T'ang said, " Mr. Fang, I'm a little disappointed today. "
sentences.cn: 唐小姐道: “ 方先生, 我今天来了有点失望—— ”

sentences.en: Miss Tang said, " Mr. Fang, you are too concerned with insignificant details.
sentences.cn: 唐小姐道: “ 方先生真会挑眼!

sentences.en: Mr. Fang, you drink too , even if only half a glass. "
sentences.cn: 方先生, 半杯也喝半杯. ”

sentences.en: Please forgive me, Mr. Fang - what I just said wasn't meant seriously. "
sentences.cn: 请方先生原谅 - -刚才说的话,不当真的. ”

sentences.en: The cobra sank its venomous fangs into his hand.
sentences.cn: 眼镜蛇将毒牙咬进他的手。

sentences.en: To add to his troubles , Ming - fang seemed to be avoiding him.
sentences.cn: 尤其使他不安的是, 鸣凤好像故意在躲避他.

words.tran_cn: 有牙根的；有毒牙的，有尖牙的

trans.tran_cn: 尖牙，（蛇的）毒牙，犬牙，蜘蛛的螯角
trans.tran_en: a long sharp tooth of an animal such as a snake or wild dog
